description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Shop' which renders a shop interface for a game. It includes UI elements for displaying shop items, buttons for rolling the shop, freezing items, and buying items, and interacts with game state via the 'useGame' context.

methods.name: buy
methods.description: Handles the purchase action by calling 'buyFromShop' with the selected item index and a default target from the team.
